articles.title: Protecting India's geriatric population from the rising heat burden
articles.author: Newsgram Desk
articles.summary: Researchers at Cornell University have developed a thermoelectric device (TED)-based cooling garment for personal cooling that maintains skin temperature in environments as hot as 40 °C.
